tonite

"so let's see... a river splittin’ & goin' two different ways, a bulky-unmovable-thingy smack in the middle, one side of the canal is undergoing heavy reconstruction, the other has a penis-like-thingy erectin' in the background with nothin' else around... wonder why she send me this photo...?
"wonder if he's still stressin' out the random shit I send him...? punk better not be postin' photos of me online...

responsible, u say?
